name: Avatar
description: An Avatar holds tokens, reputation and ether for a controller.

functionDecorators.name: externalTokenApproval
functionDecorators.description: externalTokenApproval approve the spender address to spend a specified amount of tokens on behalf of msg.sender.

parameterDecorators.name: _externalToken
parameterDecorators.description: the address of the Token Contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of ether (in Wei) which the approval is referring to.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of tokens to transfer.

functionDecorators.name: externalTokenTransferFrom
functionDecorators.description: external token transfer from a specific account.

parameterDecorators.name: _from
parameterDecorators.description: the account to spend token from.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: the amount of tokens to transfer.

functionDecorators.name: genericCall
functionDecorators.description: perform a generic call to an arbitrary contract.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: ABI-encoded contract call to call `_contract` address.

parameterDecorators.name: _value
parameterDecorators.description: value (ETH) to transfer with the transaction.

functionDecorators.name: metaData
functionDecorators.description: metaData emits an event with a string, should contain the hash of some meta data.

parameterDecorators.name: _metaData
parameterDecorators.description: a string representing a hash of the meta data.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore. Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

functionDecorators.name: sendEther
functionDecorators.description: send ethers from the avatar's wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: _amountInWei
parameterDecorators.description: amount to send in Wei units.

parameterDecorators.name: _to
parameterDecorators.description: send the ethers to this address.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

parameterDecorators.name: newOwner
parameterDecorators.description: The address to transfer ownership to.
